channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 观看：从美国州政府保护音乐家到英国广播公司建立自己的人工智能模型，以下是本周人工智能革命的热门新闻
item.description:
WATCH: From a US state protecting musicians to Britain’s BBC building its own AI model, here’s this week’s top stories from the AI revolution https://t.co/5CFBQADHbM pic.twitter.com/j5FScadHwb

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024

item.title: 观看：比亚迪的大幅折扣可能帮助其取代特斯拉成为全球电动汽车销量冠军，但也对其造成了打击。这家中国汽车制造商的季度利润增长速度为两年来最慢。
item.description:
WATCH: BYD’s heavy discounts may have helped it unseat Tesla as the world’s top EV seller but hit it too. The Chinese carmaker reported its slowest quarterly profit rise in two years https://t.co/44T38kJVUY pic.twitter.com/P5tGhinXv0

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024

item.title: 诺和诺德公司的药物semaglutide使该公司成为欧洲最有价值的公司。但投资组合经理兰迪-沃茨（Randy Watts）告诉 @路透社，这只是减肥药的开始
item.description:
Novo Nordisk’s drug semaglutide has made the company the most valuable in Europe. But portfolio manager Randy Watts told @Reuters this is just the beginning for weight loss drugs https://t.co/faYQWWdYWq pic.twitter.com/E1JjgbZPDu

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024

item.title: 观看：波音公司正在寻找一位大人物来掌舵这家陷入困境的飞机制造商。许多行业高管和分析师预测，波音将寻求外部补救措施
item.description:

item.description:

item.title: 一种药物--塞马鲁肽（semaglutide）改变了制药业的格局。它使诺和诺德成为欧洲最有价值的公司，但投资组合经理兰迪-沃茨告诉 @路透社，这只是减肥药的开始
item.description:
The pharmaceutical landscape has been transformed by one drug - semaglutide. It's made Novo Nordisk the most valuable company in Europe, but portfolio manager Randy Watts told @Reuters this is just the beginning for weight loss drugs https://t.co/faYQWWdYWq pic.twitter.com/oEULVacu2A

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024

item.title: 资金短缺的菲斯科与一家大型汽车制造商的谈判破裂，纽约证券交易所计划将这家电动汽车初创公司的股票从市场上摘牌，原因是其股价 "异常低迷"。
item.description:
Cash-strapped Fisker's talks over support from a major automaker have collapsed and the New York Stock Exchange plans to delist the electric-vehicle startup's shares due to ‘abnormally low’ price levels https://t.co/1H5sCrcsjb pic.twitter.com/mBH2Ora1IB

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024

item.title: 一位熟悉此事的人士告诉 @路透社，WeWork 的联合创始人亚当-诺伊曼（Adam Neumann）已提交了一份超过 5 亿美元的出价，以回购这家办公共享公司。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Adam Neumann, the co-founder of WeWork, has submitted a bid of more than $500 million to buy back the office-sharing company, a person familiar with the matter told @Reuters. More here: https://t.co/PuU3tFPxa5 pic.twitter.com/kzDm6ZGQXJ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024

item.title: 观看：在日益严重的危机中，波音公司正在寻找新的首席执行官，这可能是从公司外部高调招聘的人选，因为波音公司正在寻求与过去一刀两断。
item.description:
WATCH: Amid a growing crisis, Boeing is looking for a new CEO in what could be a high-profile hire from outside the company as it seeks a clean break with the past https://t.co/jceZxW8Cvu pic.twitter.com/Krw0YReI0F

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024
